trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs> class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs> clase se utiliza en el <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> eventos.

trans-unit.source: There are only two properties in this class.
trans-unit.target: Hay solo dos propiedades en esta clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> propiedad le permite eliminar o modificar de forma predeterminada y elementos de leyenda personalizados y para agregar elementos de leyenda personalizados.

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to change the order of legend items.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad también puede utilizarse para cambiar el orden de los elementos de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A> property is used to identify the legend that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A> propiedad se utiliza para identificar la leyenda que generó este evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> con el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The legend name.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de la leyenda.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> and legend name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> con el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> y el nombre de leyenda especificados.

trans-unit.source: Used to remove, modify or change the order of both custom and default legend items in the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Se usa para quitar, modificar o cambiar el orden de los elementos de leyenda personalizados y predeterminados en el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" />.

trans-unit.source: Can also be used to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: También se puede usar para agregar elementos de leyenda personalizados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> propiedad le permite eliminar o modificar de forma predeterminada y los elementos de leyenda personalizados en el <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> eventos y para agregar elementos de leyenda personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The order of legend items can also be changed.
trans-unit.target: También se puede cambiar el orden de los elementos de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName> properties can be used to determine the data element that is associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName> propiedades se pueden usar para determinar el elemento de datos que está asociado a un elemento de leyenda predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: These properties will return zero-length strings for custom legend items, because custom items are not associated with chart data.
trans-unit.target: Estas propiedades devolverá las cadenas de longitud cero para los elementos de leyenda personalizados, porque los elementos personalizados no están asociados con los datos del gráfico.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> the event was raised for, which enables you to customize an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad le permite determinar qué <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> se generó el evento, lo que permite personalizar un individuo <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> object, which can be used to determine which legend was the sender of the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nombre del objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" />, que se puede usar para determinar la leyenda que remitió el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un valor de tipo <see langword="string" /> que representa el nombre del objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> asociado.
